title:
Field-Enhanced Filtering in MIMO Learned Volterra Nonlinear Equalisation
  of Multi-Wavelength Systems
authors: Nelson Castro, Sonia Boscolo, Andrew D. Ellis, Stylianos Sygletos
abstract:
We propose a novel MIMO-WDM Volterra-based nonlinear-equalisation scheme with
adaptive time-domain nonlinear stages enhanced by filtering in both the power
and optical signal waveforms. This approach efficiently captures the interplay
between dispersion and non-linearity in each step, leading to $46\%$ complexity
reduction for $9\times 9$-MIMO operation.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Signal Processing
